alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 8:37AM EST until January 10 at 8:21PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Yellow River at Pleasant Hill Road near Lithonia affecting Rockdale and DeKalb Counties. For the Yellow River Basin...including Suwanee, Lawrenceville, Plantation Rd Lawrenceville, Lilburn, Tanglewood Drive Snellville, Snellville, Snellville, Silver Hill Rd Stone Mtn, Lithonia, Stone Mountain, Lee Road below Snellville, Lithonia, Lithonia, Lithonia, Milstead, Gees Mill Road, Snellville, Loganville, Milstead, Milstead, Milstead, Rocky Plains...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast to occur. * WHERE...Yellow River at Pleasant Hill Road near Lithonia. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, moderate flooding begins. Significant flooding expands into the woodlands and fields near the river upstream and downstream from the gage on Pleasant Hill Road. In Dekalb County...some flooding of backyards of homes occurs on Harmony Hills Drive and Court. Johnson Creek flowing under Union Grove Road into the river continues to back up. In Rockdale County...some flooding of yards begins in the Lake Capri subdivision. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 4.9 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 16.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM EST.
